text: Axel Gabriel Erik Mørch better known as Gabriel Axel (18 April 1918 – 9 February 2014)Ronald Bergan Obituary: Gabriel Axel, The Guardian, 10 February 2014 was a Danish movie director, actor, writer and producer. He is best known for the movie Babette's Feast (1987). He wrote and directed this movie. He won an Academy Award for it. Axel died on 9 February 2014 at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1918 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Danish movie actors Category:Danish movie directors Category:Danish screenwriters Category:Television directors Category:Writers from Aarhus Category:Danish movie producers
title: Gabriel Axel
